job_title: AWS Data Engineer with Gen AI

job_details.degree_required: Master's degree or Equivalent in Computer Science, Information Technology

jd: From: Rama, DVG TECH rama@dvgts.com Reply to: rama@dvgts.com HIHope you are doing Well!­­­­ This Is Rama from Dvg Tech Solutions, We have urgent Open position with one of my client, Please go through the below JD if you are interested please share me your Updated resume Role: AWS Data Engineer with Gen AILocation: New Jersy, NJ (Onsite)Duration: Long-TermDon't Share me the Profiles With out GEN AI Need 10+ years of exp Profile with PP Number is Mandate While Submission Job Responsibilities:Design and develop scalable/ reusable Model execution component using AWS core services Develop cost monitoring component that would enable usage tracking of API’s Design, Development, and implementation of notification, and alerting systems using modern cloud technologies. Automation of Operational tasks and workload distribution in Public cloud infrastructure like AWS Streamline production deployment of various cloud components using Cloud Formation and Terraform integrated with the existing CI/CD pipelines Design, Develop and Integrate the Observability components for Cloud based GenAI application Participate in team wide application architecture reviews to present design and solutions Qualification & Core Skills requirement:Master's degree or Equivalent in Computer Science, Information Technology Ten (10) years of professional work related to software development and implementation and for the last 2 working on cloud-based platforms (AWS), preferably in Financial Services. Demonstrable experience of implementing enterprise data solutions Hands-on development skills in Python, Java in that order of priority Understanding of core AWS services uses, and basic AWS architecture best practices Proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS Experience in integrating Vendor products using Application APIs. Certifications: AWS Certified Developer – Associate or above
